# dcaspt2_input_generator

## Description

- This is a GUI tool for supporting the generation of input files for DIRAC_CASPT2 calculation.

## Prerequisites

- Python 3.7 or later
- pip

## Install

```bash
pip install dcaspt2_input_generator
```

## Usage

```bash
dcaspt2_input_generator
```
 or
```bash
python -m dcaspt2_input_generator
```
